channel.title: Whats the code when i put a santa on i turn into santa
channel.description: whats the code where i can put on a mask and turn into a dragon or put on a santa and turn into santa?

item.title: Whats the code when i put a santa on i turn into santa
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

use this format

put this under bollean process

if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == Item# == true)
{
npcId = NPC#;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
